headline: Report: Union Pacific, Norfolk Southern could reach merger deal by next week
summary: Union Pacific and Norfolk Southern could announce a merger as early as next week, according to a published report. The post Report: Union Pacific, Norfolk Southern could reach merger deal by next week appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: Union Pacific nearing agreement to buy Norfolk Southern Bloomberg reports
summary: Union Pacific had said on Thursday it is in advanced talks to acquire its rival, signaling that a deal to form a $200 billion coast-to-coast rail company could be close - and potentially trigger further consolidation among remaining freight rail giants.  Union Pacific declined to comment, while Norfolk Southern did not immediately respond to a Reuters request for comment.  The fact that talks are advancing has surprised many in the rail industry and Wall Street as the U.S. freight rail system already functions as two regional duopolies by point of origin.
